anya-e0605n0:4: Yo lokatthāya buddho dhanasutabhariyāaṅgajīve cajitvā pūretvā āramiyo tidasamanupame bodhipakkhīyadhamme,
anya-e0605n0:5: Patvā bodhiṁ visuddhaṁ sakalaguṇadadaṁ seṭṭhabhūto tiloke,
anya-e0605n0:6: Katvā dukkhassa antaṁ katasubhajanataṁ dukkhato mocayittha.
anya-e0605n0:9: Nāhu yenapi tulyo kusalamahimato uttamo bhūtaloke tassevāyaṁ uvimhaṁ suvipulamamalaṁ bodhisambhārabhūtaṁ,
anya-e0605n0:10: Hetuṁ hetvānurūpaṁ sugatagataphalaṁ bhāsato me suṇātha.
